銙字的基本解释

銙
kuǎ
古代附于腰带上的装饰品，用金、银、铁、犀角等制成：“至唐高祖……一品、二品銙以金，六品以上以犀，九品以上以银，庶人以铁。”
形似带銙的一种茶，称“銙茶”。
量词，计算茶叶銙数的单位。

銙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuǎ］
［《廣韻》苦瓦切，上馬，溪。］
(1)古代附于腰带上的扣版，作方、椭圆等形。原用来受环悬物，后纯用作装饰。其质料、数目随时代或饰者的身份而异。
(2)銙茶，形似带銙，故名。
(3)计茶的量词。
(4)悬挂。

銙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銙； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1305第08
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?苦瓦切，音骻。帶具。【唐書·柳渾傳】玉工爲帝作帶，誤毀一銙。【正字通】唐制，帶，一、二品銙以金，六品已上犀，九品已上銀，庶人鐵。明制，革帶前合口處曰三台，左右排三圓桃，排方左右曰魚尾，有輔弼二小方，後七枚，前大小十三枚。唐之十三銙卽此式初制也。　又【集韻】枯買切，音胯。義同。　【集韻】本作?。亦作錁。

銙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
銙字的起名意思

暂无。

Luo
Basic explanation of words
Luo
kuǎ
The decorations attached to the belt in ancient times were made of gold, silver, iron, rhino horn, etc.: "To the emperor of the Tang Dynasty... iron."
It looks like a kind of tea with 銙, called "銙 tea".
Quantifier, a unit for calculating the number of tea leaves.
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuǎ］
["Guangyun" bitter tile cut, mount, stream. ]
(1) The buckle plate attached to the belt in ancient times, with square, oval and other shapes. Originally used to receive ring suspension, later purely used as decoration. Its quality and number vary with the age or the identity of the adorned.
(2) Lu tea, which resembles a Luan tea, hence the name.
(3) Quantifiers for counting tea.
(4) Hanging.
Luo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銙; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 1305 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Kuwaqie, sound 骻. Belt. [Tang Shu·Liu Hun Biography] Jade works as a belt for the emperor, and mistakenly ruined it. 【Zhengzitong】Made in Tang Dynasty, with gold, first and second grades with gold, sixth grade with rhinoceros, ninth grade with silver, ordinary iron. Made in Ming Dynasty, the front joint of the leather belt is called three pieces, the left and right rows of three round peaches, the left and right sides of the row are called fish tails, there are two small squares of auxiliary bi, the back seven, and the front size 13 pieces. The thirteenth of the Tang Dynasty is also a preliminary system of this style.　[Jiyun] Dry, buy and cut, sound crotch. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】This work?. Also used as 锞.
